title: STAT+: Wave’s ‘gym bro’ obesity drug is story over substance
description: A raging bull market for biotech stocks and a good story have transformed an ineffective weight loss drug into a Wall Street sensation.
content: A raging bull market for biotech stocks and a good story have transformed an ineffective weight loss drug into a Wall Street sensation.
